content: mini pumpkin knitting pattern by kristin russo so for the longest time i couldn t find a pumpkin knitting pattern i liked so i designed my own you can really use whatever size needles and whatever size yarn you d like gauge is really insignificant with this project materials stem 4 size 7 dpns cast on 4 stitches 4oz worsted wt yarn orange and brown or knit in round until 1 5- 2 long whatever color you want your pumpkins and break yarn and draw through all remaining stems to be stitches stitch marker thread yarn from top of stem down through needle stem so both yarn ends are at the bottom stuffing thread both ends through the center of the pumpkin so the stem is attached to the top of pattern pumpkin the pumpkin and the two threads are hanging cast on 6 stitches down from the bottom- center of the knit front back in all stitches pumpkin tie these ends together at the 1 join in round and knit row bottom of the pumpkin to secure the stem 2 k1 m1 around 3 & 4 k3 p1 around 5 k2 m1 k1 p1 around 6 & 7 k4 p1 around 8 k2 m1 k2 p1 around 9- 12 k5 p1 around 13 k2 k2tog k1 p1 around 14 & 15 k4 p1 around 16 k1 k2tog k1 p1 around 17 & 18 k3 p1 around 19 k2tog around break yarn and pull through all remaining stitches but don t pull tight stuff the pumpkin now with as much stuffing as you would like pull stitches tight and thread needle straight down through the center of the pumpkin thread needle back up through the pumpkin pulling the top and bottom toward each other thread the needle back down through the pumpkin and tie loose end from cast on stitches to end from last stitches --please give pattern credit to kristin russo of the lazy pomegranate--
